#include<stdio.h>
#include<cstring>
int main()
{
	int i,j,c,t,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		c=0;
		char a[101][22],b[102];
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
		scanf("%s %c",a[i],&b[i]);
	    }
	    b[i]='\0';
		for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			for(j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
			{
				if(strcmp(a[i],a[j])==0)
				strcpy(a[j],"  ");
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(strcmp(a[i],"  ")!=0)
			{
				if(b[i]=='+')
				c=c+1;
				else
				c=c-1;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",c);
	}
	return 0;
}
